Read in the data

```{r}
file = "/Users/tsd4/OneDrive/cs/PhD/code/population-model/validated/src/main/resources/results/re-run/20170905-123212:806/tables/death-CT.csv"
data = read.csv(file, sep = ',', header = T)

```

Chosen formula model

```{r}
glm.model = glm(freq ~ Date + Age + Sex + Died + Date:Died + Age:Died + Sex:Died + Date:Age:Died + Date:Sex:Died + Age:Sex:Died, data = data, family = poisson)

summary(glm.model)
anova(glm.model, test = "Chisq")
```
